articles.title: Nuno Espirito Santo admits all 'didn't go to plan' during his four-month stint at Tottenham - Daily Mail
articles.description: The former Wolves boss replaced Jose Mourinho at the end of June ahead of the 2021/22 season. He lasted just 17 games in charge and won just five out of ten Premier League games.
articles.content:
